channel.title: How can i install a password manager like KeePass?
channel.description: i know about his: thttps://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Password_Manager#cite_note-41 but it does not help me. i need a password manager (most of all KeePass 2, i use it in another operation system), but how can i install it or another PWD Manager?

item.title: How can i install a password manager like KeePass?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi WhoZero

If Whonix-Workstation is compromised your Keepassxc VM (no networking) will be isolated. I’m sure its possible to disable networking for Keepass but won’t do any good if the VM is compromised.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i install a password manager like KeePass?

item.title: How can i install a password manager like KeePass?
item.dc:creator: WhoZero
item.description:
Thank you it works fine. But why is a installation in a workstation not recommended?

is it possible to disallow keepassx to use the internet connection?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i install a password manager like KeePass?
